shocking reverb.name: Shocking Reverb
shocking reverb.desc: Landing enough lightning Mantras without getting hit grants you a defensive lightning cloak for 15 seconds, letting you negate damage from light attacks and ironsing. [2 min CD]

amp overdrive.name: Amp Overdrive
amp overdrive.desc: Guardbreaking an opponent causes them to take extra thunder damage and applies Electrify for 7 seconds.

absolute force.name: Absolute Force
absolute force.desc: Evolve the technique of your Oppressive Force, letting both hits of your flourish deal 50% more posture damage.

martial brutality.name: Martial Brutality
martial brutality.desc: The less health your opponent has, the more posture damage you deal to them.
